content: Confirm if the interpretation for obligation is correct. Get additional Obligation if any. Summarize that as user obligation that says 'OBLIGATIONS:'

<start> obligations:Machine Learning<end>

The given profile indicates Dr. Jan de Vries's primary area of responsibility or "obligation" is Machine Learning, which aligns with his role as an Assistant Professor at Utrecht University and the listed interests in Transformers (a type of machine learning model) and compilers (which can be related to programming languages used for implementing ML algorithms).
